inclusion.criterion: lesion needing biopsy in the chest or abdominal areas
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: abdominal CT scan revealed acute edematous interstitial pancreatitis with enlarged common bile duct and intrahepatic duct confirming gall stone pancreatitis

inclusion.criterion: No serious concurrent medical illness that would preclude the patient from making a rational informed decision on participation.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: The ability to understand and willingness to sign a written informed consent form, and to comply with the protocol.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: She drinks alcohol frequently and does not smoke. She has no history of allergies and uses only multivitamins daily.

exclusion.criterion: Patients with an altered mental status that precludes understanding or consenting for the biopsy procedure will be excluded from this study.
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: patients unable to hold breath for more than 5 seconds.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has abdominal pain and vomiting, with a history of frequent alcohol consumption. Abdominal CT scan confirms gall stone pancreatitis.
